hero.title: Bangkok Field Pack
hero.subtitle: Designed for airport transfer friction, payment mismatch, and peak-hour mobility.

painPoints: High-heat walking exposure in midday windows

sections.title: Arrival and Entry
sections.summary: Pre-commit transport mode, terminal pickup point, and backup route before landing.
actions: Save offline address cards in Thai and English.
Set a no-negotiation transfer price ceiling before arrival.

sections.title: Mobility and Route Resilience
sections.summary: Use rail-first daytime routing and reserve road rides for late-night windows.
actions: Maintain two route options for every high-value move.
Store nearest rail stations for hotel and primary attractions.
Avoid schedule compression in evening traffic blocks.

sections.title: Payments and Connectivity
sections.summary: Run dual payment rails and one emergency cash layer from day zero.
actions: Split spending between digital wallet and card.
Keep a low-denomination cash reserve for transit and small vendors.
Confirm eSIM activation while airport Wi-Fi is stable.

sections.title: Disruption Playbook
sections.summary: When delays stack, protect sleep window first, then anchor transport for morning reset.
actions: Set a hard cutoff time for long-distance evening transfers.
Move non-essential activities to a secondary day block.
Send one consolidated update to companions or hosts.
